## Loading libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Boxplot

```{r}

#two boxplots (male/female) per cancer stage

patient_stage |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = cancer_stage, fill = gender)) + facet.wrap(~ cancer_stage) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

## Histogram

```{r}
patient_stage |>  
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = cancer_stage,
         fill = gender)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge",
           colour = "black",
           alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(x = "Cancer stage", y = "Occurences") +
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank()) 
```
